description:
We are looking for a senior designer to join our creative department. As a member of the design team, you’ll have the opportunity to work across our client roster. We’re looking to inspire each other and bring fresh, exciting designs to our brand partners. If you’re looking for your next challenge, we’d love to hear from you.

Responsibilities:

  • Bring exciting design solutions for a broad range of projects
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams
  • Be an inspiration for other team members
  • Bring a fresh perspective to our client partners’ needs


Requirements:

  • 6–9 years of experience; agency experience is a plus
  • A portfolio that shows a range of design thinking and ability
  • A strong design sense across media
  • A hunger and an eagerness to push design to places we’ve not yet seen


This is a remote position.
